# Movie info
The bot should be able to fetch movie data from IMDb and format it in a nice way. Example of the format:

[Embed Builder](https://autocode.com/tools/discord/embed-builder/?%3D%3D)
```JS
const lib = require('lib')({token: process.env.STDLIB_SECRET_TOKEN});

await lib.discord.channels['@0.3.0'].messages.create({
  "channel_id": `${context.params.event.channel_id}`,
  "content": `@Cinephile There will be a watch party for \"_Everything Everywhere All at Once_ (2022)\" starting in ~10 mins!`,
  "tts": false,
  "embeds": [
    {
      "type": "rich",
      "title": `Everything Everywhere All at Once (2022)`,
      "description": `An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.`,
      "color": 0xF74553,
      "fields": [
        {
          "name": `Duration`,
          "value": `2h 19m`,
          "inline": true
        },
        {
          "name": `Rating`,
          "value": `8.2/10 (157k votes)`,
          "inline": true
        },
        {
          "name": `Genres`,
          "value": ` Action, Adventure, Comedy`
        },
        {
          "name": `Directors`,
          "value": `[Dan Kwan](http://google.com) ( [Swiss Army Man](http://google.com) )\n[Daniel Scheinert](http://google.com) ( [Swiss Army Man](http://google.com) )`
        },
        {
          "name": `Stars`,
          "value": `[Michelle Yeoh](http://google.com) ( [Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon](http://google.com) )\n[Stephanie Hsu](http://google.com) ( [The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel](http://google.com) )\n[Ke Huy Quan](http://google.com) ( [Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom](http://google.com) )`
        }
      ],
      "image": {
        "url": `https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzE4MThiZWYtNjBjNC00NGM5LThkMWMtZTg5YTRiMGZhYWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg`,
        "height": 0,
        "width": 0
      },
      "thumbnail": {
        "url": `https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTdiOTIyZTQtNmQ1OS00NjZlLWIyMTgtYzk5Y2M3ZDVmMDk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAzMDg4NzU0._V1_.jpg`,
        "height": 0,
        "width": 0
      },
      "url": `https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6710474/`
    }
  ]
});
```
